extension.name: RSJuno!
extension.author: RSJoomla!
extension.description:
RSJuno! 1.0.16 Changelog

  • Upg Weblinks has been removed from sample content since the component will no longer ship with Joomla! 3.4
  • Upg Social icons changed from images to CSS icons.
  • Upg Sample Data Installer has been re-factored.
  • Upg Cosmetic change: 'Load Bootstrap' 'Yes' button now in align with the 'Load jQuery' one.
  • Fix In the error page, jQuery was only loaded when Bootstrap was loaded as well.
  • Fix Sample Data Installer did not check if the backend user had access to com_templates.
  • Fix Missing language strings from the Sample Installer.
  • Fix Sample Data Installer created the menu item for RSMediaGallery! even if the component was not installed.
  • Fix Tab contents did not overflow properly.
Start using RSJuno! Read the RSJuno! User Guide Get Support!

field.name: googleClasses
field.default: h1, h2, h3, .rstpl-contact-form input[type='submit'], .rstpl-social > .rstpl-social-inner > h5, .categories-list > ul > li > .item-title, .btn, .navbar .nav > li > a, .dropdown-menu > li > a, .menu > .divider > .separator, .menu > li > .nav-header, .menu > li > a, .menu .nav-inner > li > a, .menu .nav-child > li > a, .page-header h2, .rstpl-latest-news > li > a, .rstpl-read-more-link-all, .navbar .brand, .blog h2, .rsb_blog_title, .formBody input[type='submit'], .formBody input[type='reset'], .formContainer .formControls > .formBody input[type='submit'], .button, .rstpl-before-footer .rsform .formContainer .formControls .formBody input[type='submit'], div.userItemHeader h3.userItemTitle, div.itemHeader h2.itemTitle, .navbar .nav > li > span.separator, .navbar .nav > li span.nav-header
